title: One-Time Purchase Configuration
description: Configure your one-time purchase billing model with delivery options, licensing, and payment settings

fields.name: deliveryMethod
fields.label: Delivery Method
fields.description: Choose how customers will receive their purchased products

fields.name: deliveryDelay
fields.label: Delivery Delay (hours)
fields.description: Optional delay before delivery (0 for immediate)

fields.name: downloadLimit
fields.label: Download Limit
fields.description: Maximum number of downloads allowed (0 for unlimited)

fields.name: accessDuration
fields.label: Access Duration (days)
fields.description: How long customers can access the product (0 for lifetime)

fields.name: webhookUrl
fields.label: Webhook URL
fields.description: URL to notify when purchase is complete

fields.name: licenseType
fields.label: License Type
fields.description: Define the usage rights for your product

fields.name: customLicenseTerms
fields.label: Custom License Terms
fields.description: Enter your custom license terms and conditions

fields.name: generateLicenseKeys
fields.label: Generate License Keys
fields.description: Automatically generate unique license keys for each purchase

fields.name: keyFormat
fields.label: Key Format
fields.description: Choose the format for generated license keys

fields.name: customKeyPattern
fields.label: Custom Key Pattern
fields.description: Define custom key pattern (e.g., XXX-XXX-XXX where X = random character)

fields.name: acceptPreorders
fields.label: Accept Pre-orders
fields.description: Allow customers to purchase before the product is available

fields.name: chargeTiming
fields.label: Charge Timing
fields.description: When to charge customers for pre-orders

fields.name: releaseDate
fields.label: Expected Release Date
fields.description: When the product will be available (optional)

fields.name: partialPayments
fields.label: Allow Partial Payments
fields.description: Enable customers to pay in installments

fields.name: minimumDeposit
fields.label: Minimum Deposit (%)
fields.description: Minimum percentage required as initial payment

fields.name: maxInstallments
fields.label: Maximum Installments
fields.description: Maximum number of payment installments allowed

fields.name: refundPolicyType
fields.label: Refund Policy Type

options.label: No Refunds
options.policyText: All sales are final. No refunds will be provided under any circumstances.

options.label: Standard 30-Day Policy
options.policyText: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, you can request a full refund within 30 days of purchase.

options.label: Extended 60-Day Policy
options.policyText: We offer a 60-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, you can request a full refund within 60 days of purchase.

options.label: Conditional Refund
options.policyText: Refunds are available under specific conditions. Please contact support to discuss your situation and eligibility for a refund.

fields.description: Choose your refund policy type

fields.name: refundPolicyText
fields.label: Refund Policy Text
fields.description: Detailed refund policy that customers will see

fields.name: refundWindow
fields.label: Refund Window (days)
fields.description: Number of days customers have to request a refund

fields.name: autoApproveRefunds
fields.label: Auto-approve Refunds
fields.description: Automatically approve refund requests within the refund window
